peregrine.client
Class GetClient

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.client.Client
      peregrine.client.GetClient

public class GetClient
extends Client

Run a get request for the given keys. Clients specify a connection. Then create a Get object, set the keys they wish to fetch, then call exec() and then waitFor() to get the results back.

The connection should be the URL to a load balanced pool of worker daemons.

The results can be read by first calling waitFor() and then calling getRecords(). Note that the results MAY NOT be in the order that you specified in the request.
